Checkout Extension Summary:
Qenvas Checkout provides a convenient way to purchase clothes and fashion items from your favorite clothing stores, including Mr Price, Zara, Foschini, and Thruworths, and receive them on the same day. This saves you from waiting for days to receive your online order. You can shop from your favorite stores and get your clothes and fashion items quickly and conveniently. You can buy online from local stores and get your clothes and fashion items delivered on the same day.

Extension Overview:
Qenvas Checkout allows you to shop online from your favorite stores near you and receive your clothes and fashion items within two hours on the same day. You can browse and add items to your cart and then click on the "Checkout with Qenvas" button on your cart page. This action collects the product items and the following information on your cart page: Product Name, image, price, size, color, and quantity. This allows Qenvas to fulfill the order purchase on your behalf. The Qenvas extension does not collect any personal information.

How it works:

1. Install the extension on your browser and shop as you normally would.
2. Add clothes and fashion items to your cart, and when you're ready to checkout, go to your cart.
3. Click the "Checkout with Qenvas" button on the cart page.
4. By clicking on the extension button, Qenvas collects the cart item's information and fulfills the customer's order from a shopping store near them.
5.Then, you can wait to receive your order within hours.
